foreignData.flavorText: 水晶球涌动着泰菲力鹏洛客火花的力量。尤依拉带给他的是祝福，还是诅咒？
foreignData.name: 抉择
foreignData.text:
占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）
抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 水晶球湧動著泰菲力鵬洛客火花的力量。尤依菈帶給他的是祝福，還是詛咒？
foreignData.name: 抉擇
foreignData.text:
占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）
抽一張牌。

mainBoard.name: Opt
mainBoard.originalText:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Draw a card.
mainBoard.text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
Draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.
mainBoard.name: Thriving Isle
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
